manga.title: Title
manga.not-found: sorry, I'm can't find anything related of: `{{args}}`.
manga.args-null: sorry, you didn't specify any manga tite for me to search.

ppt.option-not-found: you can only choose between `rock`, `paper` or `scissors`.
ppt.you-win: you picked `{{me}}` and I picked `{{clientChoice}}`. Congratulations, you won. I gave you `{{value}}` Yens.
ppt.you-lose: you picked `{{me}}` and I picked `{{clientChoice}}`, I won! Charging you `{{value}}` Yens, sweetheart.
ppt.value-not-inputed: you didn't provide any value to bet.

no-premium: this server is not premium, partner or verified.

setbanner.args-null: you must enter the image link you wish set as the banner

serverbanner.no-banner: hmm... seems like this server does not have a banner

servericon.no-icon: this server doesn't have an icon.

translate.args-null: you didn't argue something for me to translate.

renameemoji.args-null: you didn't mention the emoji you want to rename.
renameemoji.emoji-not-found: this emoji is not on this server.
renameemoji.emoji-name-null: you didn't enter the name you want to put.

reply.args-null: you need to enter the message ID.
reply.quote-null: you didn't enter what you want to answer.
reply.message-not-found: this message does not exist, or it is from another channel.

remove.args-null: you need to put the number of the song you want to remove from the playlist.
remove.not-number: you putting something that is not a number.
remove.max-and-minimum: you can remove up to **{{max}}** songs from the playlist.

config.title: Module Settings

report.title: Report module
report.enable: report module successfully activated and report channel set.

config.module-not-found: this module was not found, existing modules: `punishment`, `report`, `animu`.
config.options-not-found: this option was not found, available options: `set`,` disable`

report.disable: this module is disabled on this server, to enable it, use `{{prefix}} config report set #channel`
report.channel-null: I couldn't find the whistleblower channel, so I disabled the module to avoid future errors.

colors.hex: you have to enter a `hex` colour.
colors.success: alright, I've changed your embed profile colour and charged you 1.000 Yens
colors.this-color: This will be the new embed's colour. Do you want to change it? I will charge you 1.000 Yens.
colors.cancel: alright, as you didn't want to change the colour, I won't charge you.

aboutme.args-null: argue something to change your aboutme

addemoji.error: I couldn't add this emoji, maybe it's bigger than the size allowed by Discord, I'm sorry for that.

addrole.mentionRoleNull: role not found, are you sure you entered the role name correctly?
addrole.noPerm: I was unable to add this role to the user, please make sure my role is above the role indicated

anime.args-null: Enter the name of the desired anime.
anime.title: Anime Name
anime.NotFound: I couldn't find anything related to `{{args}}`.

announce.noMention: you need to indicate which chat you want me to send the announcement.
announce.noMsg: you have not argued a message to send, please indicate what you want me to send.
announce.confirmed:
warning, you are about to send an announcement on {{chat}}, please confirm with the emojis below. 
To mention `@everyone`, click the <a:success:577973168342302771>. 
To mention`@here`, click the <:warn:672470606578581524>.
To mention anyone, click on <a:error:577973245391667200>

ban.banAuthor: you can't ban yourself by Discord, so you can't ban yourself by me.
ban.bannable: I can't ban this user, his role is bigger than mine.

botinfo.description:
Hi, my name is ** {{clientName}} ** and I'm just another simple bot for the Discord of anime `Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka?`.

I was developed in the JavaScript using discord.js, I was created ** {{clientcreatedAt}} **, I joined `{{guildName}}` ** {{clientJoinedAt}} ** and I've been awake for ** {{ clientUptime}} **. 
 
I'm on {{clientGuildSize}} servers and I know {{clientUserSize}} bunnies!

calc.args-null: you must enter a valid value.

changeavatar.avatar: Okay, now I have a new avatar

changenickname.args-null: I need you to supply the new nickname you want me to set in the user.
changenickname.success: nickname `{{member}}` has been successfully changed to {{nickname}}.
changenickname.highest-role: I can't change this user's nickname because their role is higher than mine

chat.args-null: put `on` to enable chat and `off` to disable chat.
chat.enable: chat enabled again, now everyone can talk again.
chat.disable: chat has been successfully disabled, now only superiors can talk here.

clear.error: I couldn't delete some messages once they are over **2 weeks**.
clear.args-null: you need to indicate how many messages you want me to delete
clear.limit: I can only delete up to `100` messages due to Discord limitations.

choose.args-null: you need to argue something to choose from.

congaparrot.args-null: you did not supply the desired amount.

dj: Well, the `DJ` permission is designed to prevent people from abusing music commands (such as skipping the music you are listening to or getting me out of the voice channel where you also find yourself). To get this permission, you must have permission to `Manage Server`, `Ban Members` or have the role named `DJ`, do that, good fun and enjoy my music commands, bye bye.

eval.error: I can't execute these codes because they are wrong, check https://discord.js.org to learn how.

fakemsg.args-null: you need to supply something for the fake user to talk about.

hug: {{author}} gave a very nice hug in {{member}}

invite.invite:
Do you want to invite me do other Discord servers? Click [here](https://discordapp.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{clientID}}&scope=bot&permissions=2117578239) to add me on another server

Also, log into my support server if you need help with me by clicking [here](https://discord.gg/CAm9cSU)

 Don't forget to vote for me by clicking [here](https://top.gg/bot/481282441294905344)

kick.authorKick: you can't kick yourself out of Discord, so I won't kick you out.
kick.kickable: I can't kick this user, it's role is bigger than mine.

language.howLanguage:
what is your language? Choose below

🇧🇷 `pt-BR`
🇺🇸 `en-US`
🇵🇹 `pt-PT`

np.name: Music title

pay.limit: this amount has exceeded the **yen limit**!
pay.value-null: you need to enter the amount you wish to donate.
pay.invalid-value: the value you entered is invalid.
pay.success: you have successfully donated `{{value}}` yens to {{member}}.
pay.this-author: you cannot donate yens to yourself.
pay.confirm: user {{member}} is going to receive `{{value}}` Yens. Do you really want to finish the transaction? I will charge you `{{porcent}}%` as a tax.
pay.cancel: got it, as you didn't want to complete the transaction, I've cancelled the transaction of `{{value}}` Yens.

play.addedQueue: song `{{songTitle}}` has been added to the queue
play.args-null: you need to indicate the name or URL of the song.
play.unavailable: Oh no! My music system is currently unavailable, but you can use [Meteora](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=464304679128530954&permissions=3509248&scope=bot) as a workaround...

prefix.args-null: you need to enter the new prefix
prefix.limit: the prefix can only contain `3` characters.

removerole.noRole: the user is not in this role.
removerole.error: I couldn't remove the user's roles, maybe the role is bigger than mine.

renamechannel.channel-mention-null: you need to enter the channel you want me to rename
renamechannel.args-null: you need to enter the name you want me to set for the desired channel

rize.args-null: what should Rize write on paper?

seek.args-null: you need to enter the value in seconds to change the position of the song.

seticon.args-null: I did not find any pictures.

slowmode.args-null: enter the value in seconds between `0` and `600`

spotify.author: Singer
spotify.url: You can listen to this song
spotify.userNoListen: the user **{{member}}** is not listening to **Spotify**

stop: the song was stopped and the queue was cleared

volume.maxVolume: respect the limit, the maximum volume is `100`.

vote.voteMsg:
Well, since you want to vote for me, just click [here](https://top.gg/bot/481282441294905344), if you voted, thanks, 
 
If you need help with my commands, type `{{prefix}} help` that I will send in your private.

send-dm: I sent in your private, take a look there.
mention-null: user not found, try to mention it next time.
closed-dm: Your direct messages are disabled, I could not send the information there.

dj-module.channel-null: you are not on any voice channels.
dj-module.another-channel: You need to be on the same voice channel as me.

daily.description: To get the Yens, you'll have to vote on me. Every 12 hours you'll be able to claim your Yens.
daily.vote: If so, click [here](https://top.gg/bot/481282441294905344/vote). Once you have voted, run the command again.
daily.daily-success: has been deposited `{{total}}` yens to your account.
daily.has-been-picked: if you have already withdrawn your daily yen, please wait `{{tempo}}` before you can get it again.

mc: input the nickname of the player.

roleColor.higherRole: this role is higher than mine, I can't change it's color!

money.invalidOptions:
invalid command!
**Correct usage:**	{{ prefix }}{{ name }} {from} {to} [ammount]
**Example:**		  {{ prefix }}{{ name }} BRL USD 1
money.invalidValue: please give me a correct value!

restrictemoji.role-null: this role is not in your server.

restrictemoji.successfully-removed: the emojis is not locked to member with the `{{role}}` role anymore.
